summary:
I am Winter, man of quill and sword
A poet, warrior, lover and like Ulfric a true Nord.
Take me with you, into the bloody fight.
Ever by your side in the darkest Skyrim night.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v212/ElectraNemora/win1.jpg[/IMG]

I am Winter, man of quill and sword
A poet, warrior, lover and like Ulfric a true Nord.
Take me with you, into the bloody fight.
Ever by your side in the darkest Skyrim night.

Winter is a Nord warrior and poet willing to join forces with like-minded heroes.  Winter is good with a two handed weapon, and has his own perspective on things.  He\'d like you to read his book of poetry.  

Winter can be found in the Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun.  

You will need: \'Apachii Sky Hair\' 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/

To make Winter look as young as in the picture I recommend: 
\'Final Younger Characters\'
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2332

Thanks and acknowledgements to Apachii and Toshiki.

***Update 21/7/2012***
Added some personal conversation dialogue, you will need subtitles enabled to read.
author: Erebus Red
